channel.title: Re:Turn 2 - Runaway Devlog - itch.io
channel.description: Re:Turn 2 is a 2D psychological horror adventure game

item.title: Re:Turn 2 - Runaway is Out Now!
item.description: Hello, passengers, After more than a year of working hard on our game, Re:Turn 2 - Runaway is finally live on Steam! We have poured our souls into this game world and story over the past year, and we...

item.title: Re:Turn 2 - Runaway Release Date Announcement
item.description: All aboard, dear passengers, We're very excited to announce that the release date for Re:Turn 2 - Runaway has been set and will be available at the Nintendo Switch, Xbox and Steam on the 28th January...

item.title: Demo update v0.1.9
item.description: Hi everyone, The current demo files have been updated to version 0.1.9. Some minor changes and improvements have been made. Here's what's new: - A new VERY COOL kill animation - Bugfixes and tweaks Ho...

item.title: Re:Turn 2 Demo is available now on Itch
item.description: Our Demo is available now on Itch. Take a sneak peek at the sequel with all-new voice lines, animations, artwork, and designs. All these features and more as the story continues with our protagonist S...

item.title: Re:Turn 2 – Runaway Steam Demo is available now
item.description: Hey Returners! Saki returns in the upcoming sequel Re:Turn 2 – Runaway, the sequel to Re:Turn – One Way Trip. Download the demo today to see how her chilling story continues with all-new voice lin...

item.title: Re:turn 2 - Runaway playable demo In June!
item.description: We are excited to announce Re:Turn 2 - Runaway coming to all formats later this year! Not only will you be able to play the full game on its release on PC, Switch, Xbox, and PlayStation on September 3...
